# 光线度量的定义

## ![image-20241112110408687](assets/image-20241112110408687-20250209174448-3yat2tz.png)

## 发光强度Radiant Intensity——单位立体角上辐射的power

![image-20241112110554830](assets/image-20241112110554830-20250209174448-x380yf6.png)

### 立体角的定义

![image-20241112141510843](assets/image-20241112141510843-20250209174448-xgzgii4.png)

$\omega$  可以作为方向向量

![在这里插入图片描述](assets/658d95fd19971f55d4ccaf3eb7158658-20250209174448-rumx7p0.png)

#### 单位（微分）立体角 $d\omega$

![image-20241112144318232](assets/image-20241112144318232-20250209174448-fg73n7o.png)

![image-20241112144442426](assets/image-20241112144442426-20250209174448-v6gdjhp.png)

### 均匀的I

![image-20241112145537565](assets/image-20241112145537565-20250209174448-c9z4831.png)

$$
\Phi =  I \int_{S^2}d{\omega}
$$

$$
I = \frac \Phi {4 \pi}
$$

## 辉度Irradiance——单位面积上接收 的power（来自各个方向）

![image-20241112152117751](assets/image-20241112152117751-20250209174448-zq1785y.png)

均匀分布情况下$E(x) = \frac  \Phi A$
